biotools.summary: Open source programming library that allows anyone without much programming experience to build custom genome browser websites or apps. With a few lines of codes, one can set up GIVE service on a local machine, manage custom data and build an interactive genome browser.

bioschemas.name: GIVE
bioschemas.summary: Open source programming library that allows anyone without much programming experience to build custom genome browser websites or apps. With a few lines of codes, one can set up GIVE service on a local machine, manage custom data and build an interactive genome browser.
